verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \add Concerning\add* the \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which ye shall \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \add to be\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocations|strong="H4744"\w*, \add even\add* these \add are\add* my \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w work|strong="H4399"\w* be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: but the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of \w rest|strong="H7677"\w*, an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*; ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein:\add* it \add is\add* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in all your \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w*.

¶ These \add are\add* the \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add even\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocations|strong="H4744"\w*, which ye shall \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* in their \w seasons|strong="H4150"\w*.

In the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \add day\add* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*.

And on the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the same \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add is\add* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ye must \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*.

In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall have an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*: ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein.

But ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*: ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein\add*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto you, and shall \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* thereof, then ye shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w sheaf|strong="H6016"\w* of the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of your \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:\f + \fr 23.10 \ft sheaf: or, handful: Heb. omer\f*

And he shall \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* the \w sheaf|strong="H6016"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to be \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w* for you: on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* after the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* it.

And ye shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when ye \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* the \w sheaf|strong="H6016"\w* an he \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*: and the drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w*.

And ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* neither \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, nor parched \w corn|strong="H7039"\w*, nor green \w ears|strong="H3759"\w*, until the \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* ye have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* an \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* in all your \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w*.

¶ And ye shall \w count|strong="H5608"\w* unto you from the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* after the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that ye \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w sheaf|strong="H6016"\w* of the wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w*; \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w complete|strong="H8549"\w*:

Even \w unto|strong="H5704"\w* the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* after the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* shall ye \w number|strong="H5608"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; and ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Ye shall bring \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of your \w habitations|strong="H4186"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w* of \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w*: they shall be of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*; they shall be \w baken|strong="H0644"\w* with \w leaven|strong="H2557"\w*; \add they are\add* the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* with the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*: they shall be \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, with their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*, \add even\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Then ye shall \w sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* them with the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, with the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*: they shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

And ye shall \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* it may be an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w* unto you: ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein: it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* in all your \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

¶ And when ye \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* of your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, thou shalt not make clean \w riddance|strong="H3615"\w* of the \w corners|strong="H6285"\w* of thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w* when thou \w reapest|strong="H7114"\w*, neither shalt thou \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* any \w gleaning|strong="H3951"\w* of thy \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*: thou shalt \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* them unto the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, and to the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, In the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, shall ye have a \w sabbath|strong="H7677"\w*, a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* of \w blowing|strong="H8643"\w* of trumpets, an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*.

Ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein:\add* but ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Also|strong="H0389"\w* on the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of this \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add there shall be\add* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w*: it shall be an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w* unto you; and ye shall \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w work|strong="H4399"\w* in that \w same|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for it \add is\add* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for you \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For whatsoever \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add it be\add* that shall not be \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* in that \w same|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, he shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And whatsoever \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add it be\add* that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* any \w work|strong="H4399"\w* in that \w same|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, the same \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* will I \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no manner of \w work|strong="H4399"\w*: \add it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* in all your \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w*.

It \add shall be\add* unto you a \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of \w rest|strong="H7677"\w*, and ye shall \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: in the \w ninth|strong="H8672"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, from \w even|strong="H6153"\w* unto \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, shall ye \w celebrate|strong="H7673"\w* your \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*.\f + \fr 23.32 \ft celebrate: Heb. rest\f*
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of this \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w* \add for\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

On the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add* an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*: ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein\add*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall be an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w* unto you; and ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: it \add is\add* a solemn \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w*; \add and\add* ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein\add*.  +  r 23.36  t solemn…: Heb. day of restraint *

These \add are\add* the \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which ye shall \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \add to be\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocations|strong="H4744"\w*, to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, and drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*, every \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* upon \w his|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

Beside the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and beside your \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w*, and beside all your \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, and beside all your freewill \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w*, which ye \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Also in the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, when ye have \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* in the \w fruit|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, ye shall \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: on the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w sabbath|strong="H7677"\w*, and on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w sabbath|strong="H7677"\w*.

And ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* you on the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w boughs|strong="H6529"\w* of \w goodly|strong="H1926"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w branches|strong="H3709"\w* of \w palm|strong="H8558"\w* trees, and the \w boughs|strong="H6057"\w* of \w thick|strong="H5687"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* of the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*; and ye shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 23.40 \ft boughs of goodly trees: Heb. fruit of, etc\f*

And ye shall \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* it a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*. \add It shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* in your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*: ye shall \w celebrate|strong="H2287"\w* it in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

Ye shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w booths|strong="H5521"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; all that are \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w born|strong="H0249"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w booths|strong="H5521"\w*:

That your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I made the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w booths|strong="H5521"\w*, when I brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w declared|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* the \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
